overview: George Halatsis joined Husky in January 2009 as Vice President, Finance and Chief Financial Officer. Before joining Husky, Mr. Halatsis served as Executive Vice President and CFO at Shoppers Drug Mart Corporation. He has also served as CFO at Inco and Canadian Pacific Railway and began his career at Imperial Oil, a division of ExxonMobil, where he held positions of increasing responsibility in many international locations. Mr. Halatsis holds a BA (honors) degree and a Master of Business Administration degree from McGill University in MontrÃ©al, QuÃ©bec.
